letters.description: Identify hidden systemic loyalties, exclusions, and unresolved traumas within the ancestral lineage.
Access the 'knowing field' through spatial representation to witness the underlying dynamics of the family soul.
Restore the 'Orders of Love' by ensuring every member is acknowledged and placed in their rightful hierarchical position.
Utilize healing sentences and ritual movements to return inherited emotional weights to their original sources.
Integrate the new restorative image into the client's consciousness to foster long-term systemic balance and peace.
